backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, jobs, applications, posts, messaging, and admin‑gated actions with storage and access control mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented UI changes, affected files, components, and test IDs for share links, tappable phone numbers, and logo asset updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of all frontend React/TypeScript files for reference or tooling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base configuration defining theme variables and dark mode tokens for global styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for landing, onboarding, dashboard pages, and admin CMS.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPassw: UI component providing a password form to unlock the admin panel with visual feedback on failure.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access‑denied message and button redirecting users back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAdminMutat: Defines React Query mutations for admin actions like creating, updating, and deleting job vacancies and posts with password checks and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useApplicatio: Provides hooks to fetch the user's job applications and submit new applications, invalidating queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAuthorized: Implements an admin-protected user search query requiring a session password and handling unauthorized errors.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCallerRole: Fetches the current caller's role from the backend when an actor is available.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCallerUser: Fetches and updates the current user's profile with React Query and keeps loading state synced with actor readiness.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useJobs.ts: Provides queries for listing, searching, and fetching individual job vacancies based on the current actor.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useMessages.t: Defines inbox, sent messages, and send-message operations with cache invalidation after sending.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/usePosts.ts: Fetches all posts for display, depending on actor availability.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor using Internet Identity, auto-reinitializing and invalidating queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminPassword.ts: Manages a stored admin session password with unlock and lock helpers using sessionStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context and login/logout logic using Dfinity AuthClient with identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme CSS variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLayout.tsx: Provides the admin panel layout with password gating, navigation tabs, and a lock function.
Allows admins to create, edit, and delete posts, including optional image uploads with progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/admin/VacanciesAdminP: Enables admins to manage job vacancies by creating, editing, and deleting listings via a dialog form.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/BrowseJobsP: Displays job listings with search functionality and navigates to job detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/DashboardLa: Defines the user dashboard layout, handling authentication, onboarding redirect, navigation tabs, and logout.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/JobDetailPa: Displays job details and handles applying with cover letter and resume upload using progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/MessagesPag: Shows inbox and sent messages, with admin-only search and message sending functionality.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/MyApplicati: Lists the user's job applications with job info, dates, status badges, and resume links.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/ProfilePage: Renders and updates the user's profile, allowing edits and optional resume upload with progress.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/UpdatesPage: Displays announcement posts with optional images and formatted dates.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page that handles login redirects based on user profile and role, and displays marketing content.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Renders a user onboarding form that saves profile data and optionally uploads a resume with progress tracking.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters for navigation state.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON describing the project’s current state, required features, known deployment issues, and admin/auth changes needed.
